steps.description: According to Figure 4, connect any two same-type ports of the switch to the tester;

Both ports simultaneously send data to each other under corresponding loads, test frame lengths are (64, 65, 256, 1024, 1518) bytes, test duration is 60s; set load rates: heavy load 95%, light load 10%;
Record the average store-and-forward latency for different frame lengths.
